escalation_queue.name: PECR Escalation Queue
escalation_queue.description: Real-time view of jobs awaiting consent (PECR Reg. 22 compliance lock)
escalation_queue.sql:
SELECT 
  id,
  job_id,
  phone,
  status,
  consent_status,
  is_first_contact,
  created_at,
  consent_timestamp,
  CASE 
    WHEN consent_status = 'PENDING' AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '48 hours' THEN 'CRITICAL'
    WHEN consent_status = 'PENDING' AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours' THEN 'HIGH'
    ELSE 'NORMAL'
  END as escalation_priority
FROM jobs
WHERE consent_status = 'PENDING'
ORDER BY created_at ASC
LIMIT 100;

audit_trail.name: Immutable Audit Ledger
audit_trail.description: Complete audit trail of all system events (READ-ONLY)
audit_trail.sql:
SELECT 
  id,
  event_type,
  contact_id,
  LEFT(message_body, 100) as message_preview,
  channel,
  is_sandbox,
  created_at
FROM audit_ledger
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 500;

consent_override.name: Manual Override: CONSENT_GIVEN
consent_override.description: Admin action to manually mark consent as GIVEN (logged to audit)

denial_override.name: Manual Override: CONSENT_DENIED
denial_override.description: Admin action to manually mark consent as DENIED (logged to audit)

payment_confirmation.name: Manual Override: MARK_PAID (PSR Compliance)
payment_confirmation.description: Admin confirms payment received (bank transfer, cash, etc.)

dashboard_stats.name: Compliance Statistics
dashboard_stats.sql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE consent_status = 'PENDING') as pending_consent,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE consent_status = 'GIVEN') as consent_given,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE consent_status = 'DENIED') as consent_denied,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE consent_status = 'PENDING' AND created_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '48 hours') as critical_escalations,
  COUNT(*) as total_jobs
FROM jobs;

job_details.name: Job Detail View
job_details.sql:
SELECT 
  j.*,
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*) 
    FROM audit_ledger a 
    WHERE a.contact_id = j.job_id
  ) as audit_event_count
FROM jobs j
WHERE j.id = {{selected_job_id}};

job_audit_history.name: Job-Specific Audit History
job_audit_history.description: All audit events for selected job
job_audit_history.sql:
SELECT 
  id,
  event_type,
  message_body,
  channel,
  created_at
FROM audit_ledger
WHERE contact_id = (
  SELECT job_id FROM jobs WHERE id = {{selected_job_id}}
)
ORDER BY created_at DESC;
